title: How To Install Drip Irrigation DIY Drip Irrigation Drip Irrigation Basics

tasks.task: Installing drip irrigation system in garden
subtasks: Purchase materials (half-inch pipe, water timer, emitters, punch tool, barbs)
Connect half-inch pipe to faucet and water timer
Bury half-inch pipe under mulch bed
Install emitters spaced four inches apart
Connect extensions to main water line for additional plants
Use punch tool and heat to create connections
Adjust watering duration using water timer

tasks.task: Setting up blueberry bush drip irrigation
subtasks: Extend half-inch pipe to blueberry bushes
Connect drip emitter to poly tube
Install stakes for accurate water distribution
Repeat for other plants in flower bed

tasks.task: Customizing drip irrigation for raised garden beds
subtasks: Run half-inch pipe along raised beds
Use stretchable poly tubes for flexibility
Connect emitter to poly tube with barb
Use goof plugs to fix any issues
